thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Centennial Resource Development Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.25

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Centennial Resource Development Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.25
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Centennial Resource Development Inc :
* CENTENNIAL RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.25 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.18 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR QUARTER, AVERAGE DAILY CRUDE OIL PRODUCTION INCREASED 15 PERCENT COMPARED TO PRIOR QUARTER
* QTRLY OIL AND GAS SALES $215.9 MILLION VERSUS $61.1 MILLION
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $199.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY TOTAL AVERAGE DAILY NET PRODUCTION VOLUME 54,069 BOE/D VERSUS 18,469 BOE/D Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
